description.para: For each row, arrange the blobs into one word. There is no fixed pitch detection.

description.para: Set the min_space and max_nonspace members of the row so that the blobs can be arranged into words.

description.para: Convert a TO_BLOCK to a BLOCK.
Fabricate a real row from only the repeated blob words. Get the xheight from the block as it may be more meaningful.
